vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
κερᾰμ-ῐκός, ή, όν,
of or for pottery, γῆ κ. potter's earth, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; κ. ῥύμη, ={Κεραμεικός}, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; ὁ κ. τροχός [Refs 1st c.BC+]; κ. μάστιξ, Comedy texts Phrase for ostracism, [Refs 3rd c.AD+]; ἡ -κή (i.e. τέχνη) the potter's art, pottery, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; see at {κεραμεικός}.
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
pertaining to a potterearthenwear
made by a potter, earthen, Rev. 2:27*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 屬於陶匠的
2) 黏土陶土製的 (啟 2:27)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 属于陶匠的
2) 黏土陶土制的 (启 2:27)
